mapper.update: UPDATE mzgl_cases SET disease_name = #{name}, update_time = #{updatetime}, cases_date = #{casedata}, drug_id = #{drugid}, drug_data = #{drugdata} WHERE case_id = #{caseid}
mapper.select: SELECT mzgl_cases.case_id, mzgl_cases.disease_name, mzgl_cases.examine_id, mzgl_cases.create_time, mzgl_cases.update_time, mzgl_cases.cases_date, mzgl_doctor.name AS doctor_name, mzgl_drug.drug_name, mzgl_patient.name AS patient_name, mzgl_cases.drug_data FROM mzgl_cases JOIN mzgl_patient ON mzgl_cases.patient_id = mzgl_patient.id JOIN mzgl_drug ON mzgl_cases.drug_id = mzgl_drug.drug_id JOIN mzgl_doctor ON mzgl_cases.doctor_id = mzgl_doctor.id WHERE mzgl_cases.doctor_id = #{doctorid} AND mzgl_cases.patient_id = #{patientid}
